title: Tornado Chasers Season 1 FULL ACTUAL EPISODES
description:
Reed Timmer and his crew set out on the road to track, film, and intercept dangerous tornadoes through Tornado Alley. Watch as they both succeed and fail at their quest to learn everything they can with today's technology to help better forecast storms and in turn save lives.!

This is a WEB series, never aired on TV.. Reed Timmer was a star on Discovery Channels Storm Chasers for 5 seasons and has set off to start his own show.

TORNADO CHASERS (TVN WEATHER) ALL EPISODES ARE .MP4 FORMAT AND HAVE A VERY SMALL WATERMARK IN BOTTOM LEFT HAND CORNER

SEASON 1

Episode 1 (Grass Roots)
Release date: 09/19/2012   
Run Time: 17:51
Info:Tornado season begins and Reed Timmer starts off the year with two new team 

members, both of whom have their own opinions on where to chase. Featuring the 

November 7th, 2011 Tipton, OK intercept of a violent EF4 tornado. 

Episode 2 (The Breakup)
Release date: 09/26/2012   
Run Time: 17:50
Info:After a recent break up Reed finds himself chasing one last time with Ginger 

in hopes of gaining exposure for his grass roots operation through her reporting. 

In the end a nighttime tornado bears down on San Antonio, Texas, illuminated by 

lightning and power flashes.

Episode 3 (Outbreak!)
Release date: 10/03/2012   
Run Time: 19:57
Info:Reed takes a break from his dissertation and joins the team in battling 

their way through a line of chasers to get close to a stovepipe tornado on April 

14th, just outside of Hesston, KS.

Episode 4 (Ole Blue)
Release date: 10/10/2012   
Run Time: 18:13
Info:Tired from working on his dissertation, Reed struggles to stay awake at a 

celebrity signing event so he can get back to chase in Ole Blue.

Episode 5 (Chapter 5)
Release date: 10/17/2012   
Run Time: 19:33
Info:Reed finally finishes chapter five of his dissertation and goes sleeveless 

in the Dominator to celebrate.

Episode 6 (The Grind)
Release date: 10/24/2012   
Run Time: 19:33
Info:Reed and the team have been grinding hard this season and it's going to take 

more than a little ground circulation to boost morale.


Episode 7 (Rocket Time)
Release date: 11/07/2012   
Run Time: 18:33
Info:Reed teams up with an old friend and implements his first science mission of 

the year.

Episode 8 (Intercept)
Release date: 11/14/2012   
Run Time: 19:27
Info:After throwing out the first pitch at a Kansas City Royals game, Reed leads 

his team to victory.

Episode 9 (Birthday Boy)
Release date: 11/20/2012   
Run Time: 19:53
Info:After chasing and celebrating a birthday week on the road, Reed Timmer and 

the boys revisit Wadena, MN which was hit by a violent tornado two years prior.

Episode 10 (Quadcopter)
Release date: 12/05/2012   
Run Time: 20:38
Info:The team encounters tornado spin-ups and record-sized hail before Reed 

launches his new Quadcopter probe into a storm. Reed also revisits the massive 

2011 Canton, OK tornado.

Episode 11 (Suction Vortices)
Release date: 12/10/2012   
Run Time: 18:18
Info:TVN intercepts multiple vortices on foot in Wyoming.

Episode 12 (Stove Pipe)
Release date: 01/02/2013   
Run Time: 24:37
Info:Storm season comes to a thrilling conclusion when Reed Timmer and the boys 

scrape together what's left of the crew and head north with limited funds. 

Featuring the June 22, 2012 Fall River County tornado.

UL BY: 13eavuss

***IF YOU DONT LIKE THE SMALL AND AT MOST TIMES SMALL WATERMARK, I'M SORRY BUT I SPENT TO MUCH TIME TO GET THESE OUT TO THE PUBLIC TO HAVE IT  COPIED AND REUPLOADED
